Class ConfinedDrawingObject

java.lang.Object
blot.engine.input.blotLibrary.DrawingObject
blot.engine.input.blotLibrary.ConfinedDrawingObject
public class ConfinedDrawingObject extends DrawingObject
Offers some peace of mind that this DrawingObject will fit on a Canvas, and that it's properly centered.
